text: The men's 3000 metres steeplechase event at the 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Kingston, Jamaica, at National Stadium on 18 and 20 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Mike Kipyego ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| David Kirwa ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Abubaker Kamal ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 20 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
